Absorb Bulb.name: Absorb Bulb
Absorb Bulb.description: A consumable bulb. If the holder is hit by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk will rise.

Adrenaline Orb.name: Adrenaline Orb
Adrenaline Orb.description: Using it makes wild Pokémon more likely to call for help. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated. It can be used only once.

Apicot Berry.name: Apicot Berry
Apicot Berry.description: A hold item that raises SP. DEF in a pinch.

Armor Fossil.name: Armor Fossil
Armor Fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.

Aspear Berry.name: Aspear Berry
Aspear Berry.description: A hold item that defrosts POKéMON in battle.

Babiri Berry.name: Babiri Berry
Babiri Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Steel-type attack.

Beast Ball.name: Beast Ball
Beast Ball.description: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.

Berry Juice.name: Berry Juice
Berry Juice.description: A 100% pure juice that restores HP by 20 points.

Big Nugget.name: Big Nugget
Big Nugget.description: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

Binding Band.name: Binding Band
Binding Band.description: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.

Black Belt.name: Black Belt
Black Belt.description: A hold item that boosts FIGHTING- type moves.

Black Glasses.name: Black Glasses
Black Glasses.description: A hold item that raises the power of DARK-type moves.

Black Sludge.name: Black Sludge
Black Sludge.description: A hold item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokémon. It inflicts damage on all other types.

Bluk Berry.name: Bluk Berry
Bluk Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow BLUK.

Bottle Cap.name: Bottle Cap
Bottle Cap.description: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a silver gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.

Bright Powder.name: Bright Powder
Bright Powder.description: A hold item that casts a glare to reduce accuracy.

Bug Gem.name: Bug Gem
Bug Gem.description: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move only once.

Bug Memory.name: Bug Memory
Bug Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Bug-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Burn Drive.name: Burn Drive
Burn Drive.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Fire-type move.

Cell Battery.name: Cell Battery
Cell Battery.description: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.

Charcoal.name: Charcoal
Charcoal.description: A hold item that raises the power of FIRE-type moves.

Charti Berry.name: Charti Berry
Charti Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Rock-type attack.

Cheri Berry.name: Cheri Berry
Cheri Berry.description: A hold item that heals paralysis in battle.

Cherish Ball.name: Cherish Ball
Cherish Ball.description: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

Chesto Berry.name: Chesto Berry
Chesto Berry.description: A hold item that awakens POKéMON in battle.

Chilan Berry.name: Chilan Berry
Chilan Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s Normal-type attack.

Chill Drive.name: Chill Drive
Chill Drive.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Ice-type move.

Chople Berry.name: Chople Berry
Chople Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Fighting-type attack.

Claw Fossil.name: Claw Fossil
Claw Fossil.description: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON.

Coba Berry.name: Coba Berry
Coba Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Flying-type attack.

Colbur Berry.name: Colbur Berry
Colbur Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Dark-type attack.

Cornn Berry.name: Cornn Berry
Cornn Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow CORNN.

Cover Fossil.name: Cover Fossil
Cover Fossil.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back.

Custap Berry.name: Custap Berry
Custap Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it gets to move first just once in a pinch.

Damp Rock.name: Damp Rock
Damp Rock.description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Rain Dance used by the holder.

Dark Gem.name: Dark Gem
Dark Gem.description: A gem with an essence of darkness. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dark-type move only once.

Dark Memory.name: Dark Memory
Dark Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Dark-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Dawn Stone.name: Dawn Stone
Dawn Stone.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.

Deep Sea Scale.name: Deep Sea Scale
Deep Sea Scale.description: A hold item that raises the SP. DEF of CLAMPERL.

Deep Sea Tooth.name: Deep Sea Tooth
Deep Sea Tooth.description: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of CLAMPERL.

Destiny Knot.name: Destiny Knot
Destiny Knot.description: A long, thin, bright red string to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

Dive Ball.name: Dive Ball
Dive Ball.description: A BALL that works better on POKéMON on the ocean floor.

Dome Fossil.name: Dome Fossil
Dome Fossil.description: A piece of an ancient marine POKéMON’s shell.

Douse Drive.name: Douse Drive
Douse Drive.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Water-type move.

Draco Plate.name: Draco Plate
Draco Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

Dragon Fang.name: Dragon Fang
Dragon Fang.description: A hold item that raises the power of DRAGON-type moves.

Dragon Gem.name: Dragon Gem
Dragon Gem.description: A gem with a draconic essence.  When held, it strengthens the power of a Dragon-type move only once.

Dragon Memory.name: Dragon Memory
Dragon Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Dragon-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Dragon Scale.name: Dragon Scale
Dragon Scale.description: A strange scale held by DRAGON- type POKéMON.

Dread Plate.name: Dread Plate
Dread Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.

Dream Ball.name: Dream Ball
Dream Ball.description: A special Poké Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.

Dubious Disc.name: Dubious Disc
Dubious Disc.description: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown.

Durin Berry.name: Durin Berry
Durin Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow DURIN.

Dusk Ball.name: Dusk Ball
Dusk Ball.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.

Dusk Stone.name: Dusk Stone
Dusk Stone.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.

Earth Plate.name: Earth Plate
Earth Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

Eject Button.name: Eject Button
Eject Button.description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.

Electirizer.name: Electirizer
Electirizer.description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

Electric Gem.name: Electric Gem
Electric Gem.description: A gem with an essence of electricity. When held, it strengthens the power of an Electric-type move only once.

Electric Memory.name: Electric Memory
Electric Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Electric-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Electric Seed.name: Electric Seed
Electric Seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.

Enigma Berry.name: Enigma Berry
Enigma Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow a mystery.

Fairy Gem.name: Fairy Gem
Fairy Gem.description: A gem with an essence of the fey. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fairy-type move one time.

Fairy Memory.name: Fairy Memory
Fairy Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Fairy-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Fast Ball.name: Fast Ball
Fast Ball.description: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch fast Pokémon.

Fighting Gem.name: Fighting Gem
Fighting Gem.description: A gem with an essence of combat. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fighting-type move only once.

Fighting Memory.name: Fighting Memory
Fighting Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Fighting-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Fire Gem.name: Fire Gem
Fire Gem.description: A gem with an essence of fire. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fire-type move only once.

Fire Memory.name: Fire Memory
Fire Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Fire-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Fire Stone.name: Fire Stone
Fire Stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

Fist Plate.name: Fist Plate
Fist Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

Flame Orb.name: Flame Orb
Flame Orb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a burn on the holder in battle.

Flame Plate.name: Flame Plate
Flame Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

Float Stone.name: Float Stone
Float Stone.description: A very light stone. It reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

Flying Gem.name: Flying Gem
Flying Gem.description: A gem with an essence of air. When held, it strengthens the power of a Flying-type move only once.

Flying Memory.name: Flying Memory
Flying Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Flying-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Focus Band.name: Focus Band
Focus Band.description: A hold item that occasionally prevents fainting.

Friend Ball.name: Friend Ball
Friend Ball.description: A Poké Ball that makes caught Pokémon more friendly.

Full Incense.name: Full Incense
Full Incense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

Ganlon Berry.name: Ganlon Berry
Ganlon Berry.description: A hold item that raises DEFENSE in a pinch.

Ghost Gem.name: Ghost Gem
Ghost Gem.description: A gem with a spectral essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ghost-type move only once.

Ghost Memory.name: Ghost Memory
Ghost Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Ghost-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Gold Bottle Cap.name: Gold Bottle Cap
Gold Bottle Cap.description: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a golden gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.

Grass Gem.name: Grass Gem
Grass Gem.description: A gem with an essence of nature. When held, it strengthens the power of a Grass-type move only once.

Grass Memory.name: Grass Memory
Grass Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Grass-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Grassy Seed.name: Grassy Seed
Grassy Seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.

Great Ball.name: Great Ball
Great Ball.description: A good BALL with a higher catch rate than a POKé BALL.

Grepa Berry.name: Grepa Berry
Grepa Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow GREPA.

Grip Claw.name: Grip Claw
Grip Claw.description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.

Ground Gem.name: Ground Gem
Ground Gem.description: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move only once.

Ground Memory.name: Ground Memory
Ground Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Ground-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Haban Berry.name: Haban Berry
Haban Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Dragon-type attack.

Hard Stone.name: Hard Stone
Hard Stone.description: A hold item that raises the power of ROCK-type moves.

Heal Ball.name: Heal Ball
Heal Ball.description: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon’s HP and eliminates any status problem.

Heat Rock.name: Heat Rock
Heat Rock.description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Sunny Day used by the holder.

Heavy Ball.name: Heavy Ball
Heavy Ball.description: A Poké Ball for catching very heavy Pokémon.

Helix Fossil.name: Helix Fossil
Helix Fossil.description: A piece of an ancient marine POKéMON’s seashell.

Hondew Berry.name: Hondew Berry
Hondew Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow HONDEW.

Ice Gem.name: Ice Gem
Ice Gem.description: A gem with an essence of ice. When held, it strengthens the power of an Ice-type move only once.

Ice Memory.name: Ice Memory
Ice Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Ice-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Ice Stone.name: Ice Stone
Ice Stone.description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable snowflake pattern.

Icicle Plate.name: Icicle Plate
Icicle Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

Icy Rock.name: Icy Rock
Icy Rock.description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Hail used by the holder.

Insect Plate.name: Insect Plate
Insect Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Bug-type moves.

Iron Ball.name: Iron Ball
Iron Ball.description: A Pokémon hold item that cuts Speed. It makes Flying-type and levitating holders susceptible to Ground moves.

Iron Plate.name: Iron Plate
Iron Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Steel-type moves.

Jaboca Berry.name: Jaboca Berry
Jaboca Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, and if a foe’s physical attack lands, the foe also takes damage.

Jaw Fossil.name: Jaw Fossil
Jaw Fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks as if it could be a piece of a large jaw.

Kasib Berry.name: Kasib Berry
Kasib Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Ghost-type attack.

Kebia Berry.name: Kebia Berry
Kebia Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Poison-type attack.

Kee Berry.name: Kee Berry
Kee Berry.description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Defense if it’s hit with a physical move.

Kelpsy Berry.name: Kelpsy Berry
Kelpsy Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow KELPSY.

King's Rock.name: King's Rock
King's Rock.description: A hold item that may cause flinching when the foe is hit.

Lagging Tail.name: Lagging Tail
Lagging Tail.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

Lansat Berry.name: Lansat Berry
Lansat Berry.description: A hold item that ups the critical- hit rate in a pinch.

Lax Incense.name: Lax Incense
Lax Incense.description: A hold item that slightly lowers the foe’s accuracy.

Leaf Stone.name: Leaf Stone
Leaf Stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

Leppa Berry.name: Leppa Berry
Leppa Berry.description: A hold item that restores 10 PP in battle.

Level Ball.name: Level Ball
Level Ball.description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are a lower level than your own.

Liechi Berry.name: Liechi Berry
Liechi Berry.description: A hold item that raises ATTACK in a pinch.

Light Ball.name: Light Ball
Light Ball.description: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of PIKACHU.

Light Clay.name: Light Clay
Light Clay.description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of barrier moves like Light Screen and Reflect used by the holder.

Love Ball.name: Love Ball
Love Ball.description: Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are the opposite gender of your Pokémon.

Lucky Punch.name: Lucky Punch
Lucky Punch.description: A hold item that raises CHANSEY’s critical-hit rate.

Lum Berry.name: Lum Berry
Lum Berry.description: A hold item that heals status in battle.

Luminous Moss.name: Luminous Moss
Luminous Moss.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if hit with a Water- type attack. It can only be used once.

Lure Ball.name: Lure Ball
Lure Ball.description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon hooked by a Rod when fishing.

Luxury Ball.name: Luxury Ball
Luxury Ball.description: A cozy BALL that makes POKéMON more friendly.

Macho Brace.name: Macho Brace
Macho Brace.description: A hold item that promotes growth, but reduces SPEED.

Magmarizer.name: Magmarizer
Magmarizer.description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of magma energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

Magnet.name: Magnet
Magnet.description: A hold item that boosts ELECTRIC- type moves.

Magost Berry.name: Magost Berry
Magost Berry.description: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

Maranga Berry.name: Maranga Berry
Maranga Berry.description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.

Master Ball.name: Master Ball
Master Ball.description: The best BALL that catches a POKéMON without fail.

Meadow Plate.name: Meadow Plate
Meadow Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

Metal Coat.name: Metal Coat
Metal Coat.description: A hold item that raises the power of STEEL-type moves.

Metal Powder.name: Metal Powder
Metal Powder.description: A hold item that raises DEFENSE.

Metronome.name: Metronome
Metronome.description: A Pokémon hold item that boosts a move used consecutively. Its effect is reset if another move is used.

Micle Berry.name: Micle Berry
Micle Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it raises the accuracy of a move just once in a pinch.

Mind Plate.name: Mind Plate
Mind Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

Miracle Seed.name: Miracle Seed
Miracle Seed.description: A hold item that raises the power of GRASS-type moves.

Misty Seed.name: Misty Seed
Misty Seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Misty Terrain. It can only be used once.

Moon Ball.name: Moon Ball
Moon Ball.description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that evolve using the Moon Stone.

Moon Stone.name: Moon Stone
Moon Stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

Muscle Band.name: Muscle Band
Muscle Band.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a headband that slightly boosts the power of physical moves.

Mystic Water.name: Mystic Water
Mystic Water.description: A hold item that raises the power of WATER-type moves.

Nanab Berry.name: Nanab Berry
Nanab Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow NANAB.

Nest Ball.name: Nest Ball
Nest Ball.description: A BALL that works better on weaker POKéMON.

Net Ball.name: Net Ball
Net Ball.description: A BALL that works well on WATER- and BUG-type POKéMON.

Never-Melt Ice.name: Never-Melt Ice
Never-Melt Ice.description: A hold item that raises the power of ICE-type moves.

Nomel Berry.name: Nomel Berry
Nomel Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow NOMEL.

Normal Gem.name: Normal Gem
Normal Gem.description: A gem with an ordinary essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Normal-type move only once.

Occa Berry.name: Occa Berry
Occa Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Fire-type attack.

Odd Incense.name: Odd Incense
Odd Incense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

Old Amber.name: Old Amber
Old Amber.description: A stone containing the genes of an ancient POKéMON.

Oran Berry.name: Oran Berry
Oran Berry.description: A hold item that restores 10 HP in battle.

Oval Stone.name: Oval Stone
Oval Stone.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is shaped like an egg.

Pamtre Berry.name: Pamtre Berry
Pamtre Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow PAMTRE.

Park Ball.name: Park Ball
Park Ball.description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

Passho Berry.name: Passho Berry
Passho Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Water-type attack.

Payapa Berry.name: Payapa Berry
Payapa Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Psychic-type attack.

Pecha Berry.name: Pecha Berry
Pecha Berry.description: A hold item that heals poisoning in battle.

Persim Berry.name: Persim Berry
Persim Berry.description: A hold item that heals confusion in battle.

Petaya Berry.name: Petaya Berry
Petaya Berry.description: A hold item that raises SP. ATK in a pinch.

Pinap Berry.name: Pinap Berry
Pinap Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow PINAP.

Pixie Plate.name: Pixie Plate
Pixie Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.

Plume Fossil.name: Plume Fossil
Plume Fossil.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that flew in the sky in ancient times. It appears to be part of its wing.

Poison Barb.name: Poison Barb
Poison Barb.description: A hold item that raises the power of POISON-type moves.

Poison Gem.name: Poison Gem
Poison Gem.description: A gem with an essence of poison. When held, it strengthens the power of a Poison-type move only once.

Poison Memory.name: Poison Memory
Poison Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Poison-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Poke Ball.name: Poke Ball
Poke Ball.description: A tool used for catching wild POKéMON.

Pomeg Berry.name: Pomeg Berry
Pomeg Berry.description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly but lowers its base HP.

Power Anklet.name: Power Anklet
Power Anklet.description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Speed gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Band.name: Power Band
Power Band.description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Sp. Def gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Belt.name: Power Belt
Power Belt.description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Defense gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Bracer.name: Power Bracer
Power Bracer.description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Lens.name: Power Lens
Power Lens.description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Sp. Atk gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Weight.name: Power Weight
Power Weight.description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes HP gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Premier Ball.name: Premier Ball
Premier Ball.description: A rare BALL made in commemoration of some event.

Prism Scale.name: Prism Scale
Prism Scale.description: A mysterious scale that evolves certain Pokémon. It shines in rainbow colors.

Protective Pads.name: Protective Pads
Protective Pads.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.

Protector.name: Protector
Protector.description: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

Psychic Gem.name: Psychic Gem
Psychic Gem.description: A gem with an essence of the mind. When held, it strengthens the power of a Psychic-type move only once.

Psychic Memory.name: Psychic Memory
Psychic Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Psychic-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Psychic Seed.name: Psychic Seed
Psychic Seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Psychic Terrain. It can only be used once.

Qualot Berry.name: Qualot Berry
Qualot Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow QUALOT.

Quick Ball.name: Quick Ball
Quick Ball.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that provides a better catch rate if it is used at the start of a wild encounter.

Quick Claw.name: Quick Claw
Quick Claw.description: A hold item that occasionally allows the first strike.

Quick Powder.name: Quick Powder
Quick Powder.description: An item to be held by DITTO. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

Rabuta Berry.name: Rabuta Berry
Rabuta Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow RABUTA.

Rare Bone.name: Rare Bone
Rare Bone.description: A bone that is extremely valuable for Pokémon archaeology. It can be sold for a high price to shops.

Rawst Berry.name: Rawst Berry
Rawst Berry.description: A hold item that heals a burn in battle.

Razor Claw.name: Razor Claw
Razor Claw.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a sharply hooked claw that ups the holder’s critical-hit ratio.

Razor Fang.name: Razor Fang
Razor Fang.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It may cause the foe to flinch when the holder inflicts damage.

Razz Berry.name: Razz Berry
Razz Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow RAZZ.

Reaper Cloth.name: Reaper Cloth
Reaper Cloth.description: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

Red Card.name: Red Card
Red Card.description: A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.

Repeat Ball.name: Repeat Ball
Repeat Ball.description: A BALL that works better on POKéMON caught before.

Rindo Berry.name: Rindo Berry
Rindo Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Grass-type attack.

Ring Target.name: Ring Target
Ring Target.description: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it.

Rock Gem.name: Rock Gem
Rock Gem.description: A gem with an essence of rock. When held, it strengthens the power of a Rock-type move only once.

Rock Incense.name: Rock Incense
Rock Incense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

Rock Memory.name: Rock Memory
Rock Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Rock-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Root Fossil.name: Root Fossil
Root Fossil.description: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON.

Rose Incense.name: Rose Incense
Rose Incense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

Roseli Berry.name: Roseli Berry
Roseli Berry.description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Fairy-type attack.

Rowap Berry.name: Rowap Berry
Rowap Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, and if a foe’s special attack lands, the foe also takes damage.

Sachet.name: Sachet
Sachet.description: A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes that are just slightly too overwhelming. Yet it’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Safari Ball.name: Safari Ball
Safari Ball.description: A special BALL that is used only in the SAFARI ZONE.

Safety Goggles.name: Safety Goggles
Safety Goggles.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.

Sail Fossil.name: Sail Fossil
Sail Fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.

Scope Lens.name: Scope Lens
Scope Lens.description: A hold item that raises the critical- hit rate.

Sea Incense.name: Sea Incense
Sea Incense.description: A hold item that slightly boosts WATER-type moves.

Sharp Beak.name: Sharp Beak
Sharp Beak.description: A hold item that raises the power of FLYING-type moves.

Shed Shell.name: Shed Shell
Shed Shell.description: A tough, discarded carapace to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to switch with a waiting Pokémon in battle.

Shell Bell.name: Shell Bell
Shell Bell.description: A hold item that restores HP upon striking the foe.

Shiny Stone.name: Shiny Stone
Shiny Stone.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.

Shock Drive.name: Shock Drive
Shock Drive.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Electric-type move.

Shuca Berry.name: Shuca Berry
Shuca Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Ground-type attack.

Silk Scarf.name: Silk Scarf
Silk Scarf.description: A hold item that raises the power of NORMAL-type moves.

Silver Powder.name: Silver Powder
Silver Powder.description: A hold item that raises the power of BUG-type moves.

Sitrus Berry.name: Sitrus Berry
Sitrus Berry.description: A hold item that restores 30 HP in battle.

Skull Fossil.name: Skull Fossil
Skull Fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.

Sky Plate.name: Sky Plate
Sky Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

Smooth Rock.name: Smooth Rock
Smooth Rock.description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Sandstorm used by the holder.

Snowball.name: Snowball
Snowball.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if hit with an Ice-type attack. It can only be used once.

Soft Sand.name: Soft Sand
Soft Sand.description: A hold item that raises the power of GROUND-type moves.

Spell Tag.name: Spell Tag
Spell Tag.description: A hold item that raises the power of GHOST-type moves.

Spelon Berry.name: Spelon Berry
Spelon Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow SPELON.

Splash Plate.name: Splash Plate
Splash Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

Spooky Plate.name: Spooky Plate
Spooky Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

Sport Ball.name: Sport Ball
Sport Ball.description: A special Poké Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.

Starf Berry.name: Starf Berry
Starf Berry.description: A hold item that sharply boosts a stat in a pinch.

Steel Gem.name: Steel Gem
Steel Gem.description: A gem with an essence of steel. When held, it strengthens the power of a Steel-type move only once.

Steel Memory.name: Steel Memory
Steel Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Steel-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Stick.name: Stick
Stick.description: A stick of leek. It can be sold cheaply.

Sticky Barb.name: Sticky Barb
Sticky Barb.description: A hold item that damages the holder on every turn. It may latch on to foes that touch the holder.

Stone Plate.name: Stone Plate
Stone Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

Sun Stone.name: Sun Stone
Sun Stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

Tamato Berry.name: Tamato Berry
Tamato Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow TAMATO.

Tanga Berry.name: Tanga Berry
Tanga Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Bug-type attack.

Terrain Extender.name: Terrain Extender
Terrain Extender.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder’s move or Ability.

Thick Club.name: Thick Club
Thick Club.description: A bone of some sort. It can be sold cheaply.

Thunder Stone.name: Thunder Stone
Thunder Stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

Timer Ball.name: Timer Ball
Timer Ball.description: More effective as more turns are taken in battle.

Toxic Orb.name: Toxic Orb
Toxic Orb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that badly poisons the holder in battle.

Toxic Plate.name: Toxic Plate
Toxic Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

Twisted Spoon.name: Twisted Spoon
Twisted Spoon.description: A hold item that boosts PSYCHIC- type moves.

Ultra Ball.name: Ultra Ball
Ultra Ball.description: A better BALL with a higher catch rate than a GREAT BALL.

Up-Grade.name: Up-Grade
Up-Grade.description: A peculiar box made by SILPH CO.

Wacan Berry.name: Wacan Berry
Wacan Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Electric-type attack.

Water Gem.name: Water Gem
Water Gem.description: A gem with an essence of water. When held, it strengthens the power of a Water-type move only once.

Water Memory.name: Water Memory
Water Memory.description: A memory disc that contains Water-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Water Stone.name: Water Stone
Water Stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

Watmel Berry.name: Watmel Berry
Watmel Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow WATMEL.

Wave Incense.name: Wave Incense
Wave Incense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

Weakness Policy.name: Weakness Policy
Weakness Policy.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it’s weak to.

Wepear Berry.name: Wepear Berry
Wepear Berry.description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow WEPEAR.

Whipped Dream.name: Whipped Dream
Whipped Dream.description: A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy, puffy, whipped and whirled cream. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

White Herb.name: White Herb
White Herb.description: A hold item that restores any lowered stat.

Wide Lens.name: Wide Lens
Wide Lens.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

Wise Glasses.name: Wise Glasses
Wise Glasses.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a thick pair of glasses that slightly boosts the power of special moves.

Yache Berry.name: Yache Berry
Yache Berry.description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s supereffective Ice-type attack.

Zap Plate.name: Zap Plate
Zap Plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

Zoom Lens.name: Zoom Lens
Zoom Lens.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after the foe, its critical-hit ratio will be boosted.
